recipes.name: Almond-Crusted Tilapia
steps: Beat the eggs with the garlic powder and pepper until blended.
Stir together ground almonds and parmesan cheese in a separate bowl.
Dip the tilapia fillets in flour, then the egg, and then the almond mixture.
Melt the butter in the skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook tilapia for about 2-3 minutes on each side.
Reduce heat to medium, add salt if desired, and cook covered for about 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Artichoke Chicken
ingredients: 1 (15 oz) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
steps: In a separate bowl, mix together artichoke hearts, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, and mayo.
Place chicken in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish and cover each piece evenly with artichoke mixture.
Bake at 375 degrees for 40 minutes.

recipes.name: Asparagus and Tomatoes
steps: Put asparagus and water in the saucepan over medium heat and cover.
Cook asparagus until tender, about 10 minutes.
Drain and reduce heat to low.
Add olive oil, cheese, and tomatoes and replace lid.
Let cook for about another two minutes until cheese melts.

recipes.name: Bacon
steps: Lay bacon flat on the frying pan without preheating.
Cook bacon on low heat.
Flip bacon every 7-8 minutes until both sides are browned and crispy enough.
Pour leftover grease into a metal or glass container.

recipes.name: Baked Beef Ravioli
ingredients: 1 (25 oz) package frozen cheese or beef ravioli
steps: Brown beef and green peppers over medium-high heat.
In a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish, mix together spaghetti sauce, frozen ravioli, beef mixture, and seasonings.
Top the casserole with both cheeses and cover with aluminum foil.
Bake at 450 degrees for 30 minutes.
Let sit for 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Baked Garlic Parmesan Chicken
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees.
Lightly grease the baking dish (coat bottom with about 1/2 tablespoon of butter).
In a bowl, blend olive oil and garlic.
In a separate bowl, blend bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, and pepper.
Coat each piece of chicken in the oil mixture, then the bread crumb mixture.
Place chicken on baking dish and cook in oven for about 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Baked Spaghetti
steps: Cook spaghetti according to directions on box.
Brown the beef along with the onions and peppers.
After draining the grease, mix in the spaghetti sauce and salt.
Whisk eggs, parmesan cheese, and butter in a bowl and mix in with the spaghetti.
Lightly grease bottom of baking dish and place half of spaghetti in the dish.
Top with half the cottage cheese, mozzarella cheese, and meat sauce. Repeat the layers.
Bake in oven preheated to 350 degrees for 1 hour.
Let sit for a few minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Baked Ziti with Sausage
ingredients: 1 (15 oz) container cottage cheese or ricotta cheese
steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package.
Cook sausage, green pepper, and onions over medium heat until sausage is brown, about 10 minutes.
In a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish, stir together cottage cheese, egg, seasonings, spaghetti sauce, and half the Italian cheese.
Once done cooking, mix sausage and vegetables into the baking dish.
Sprinkle remaining Italian cheese over the top of the casserole.
Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
Let sit for a few minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Beef and Bean Chimichangas
steps: Brown beef and saute onions and green peppers over medium-high heat. Add seasonings to the beef mixture.
Lightly grease a 9x13 baking dish.
Spread a thin layer of refried beans on each tortilla.
Place an equal amount of beef mixture, corn, taco sauce, and cheese in each tortilla and place in baking dish.
Brush the tortillas with melted butter.
Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Beef and Sausage Stir-Fry
steps: Heat oil over medium-high heat.
Cook and stir meat until browned, about 8-10 minutes.
Drain some of the grease, but not all.
Stir in broccoli, carrots, peppers, onions, and garlic powder.
Cook for about 10 minutes, stirring frequently to evenly distribute the vegetables and meat.
Pour soy sauce over the top and stir to evenly coat, cooking for another 5-10 minutes.

recipes.name: Beef Enchiladas
ingredients: 1 can diced tomatoes and green chiles
steps: Make the enchilada sauce according to the directions (use the can of diced tomatoes instead of tomato sauce).
In a large pot over medium-high heat, brown the beef and cook with it the onions, green peppers, and serrano peppers.
Lightly grease the bottom of the baking dish so the enchiladas don't stick.
Pour 1/4 cup of the enchilada sauce in the bottom of the baking dish.
Put an equal amount of the beef mixture in each tortilla, along with a little bit of cheese and olives.
Tightly roll the tortillas and place seam-side down in the pan.
Pour remaining sauce over the enchiladas.
Sprinkle with remaining cheese and black olives.
Bake in oven at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.
Let stand for about 5 minutes, or else enchiladas will probably stick to the pan.
When ready to serve, add sour cream on top of the enchiladas (optional).

recipes.name: Beef Nacho Casserole
steps: Brown beef and peppers over medium-high heat.
Lightly grease a 9x13 baking dish and pour in the salsa, corn, refried beans, and seasonings.
Add cooked beef and peppers to the baking dish and stir together evenly.
Crumble tortilla chips to cover the top of the casserole.
Sprinkle cheese on top of the tortilla chip layer.
Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees.
Let sit for about 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 1.5 lbs sirloin tip, cut into thin slices
steps: Cook the noodles according to the directions on the container.
Heat the skillet over medium heat and add the beef and onions.
Cook until the beef is browned and the onions are tender.
Drain the grease and stir in the sour cream.
Add the paprika, garlic powder, and pepper.
Cook for a few minutes until the sour cream is warm throughout, but not boiling.

recipes.name: Black Beans
steps: In a medium saucepan, combine beans, onion, and garlic powder and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium-low and add the cilantro and cayenne pepper.
Cook for about 5 more minutes.

recipes.name: Bruschetta Chicken Bake
steps: Layer the chicken along the bottom of a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish.
Season the chicken with salt.
In a separate bowl, mix tomatoes, water, garlic powder, and stuffing mix. Let soften for a few minutes.
Sprinkle cheese on top of chicken, then the italian seasoning, then the stuffing mixture.
Bake at 400 degrees for about 30 minutes.

recipes.name: Cajun Chicken Lasagna
ingredients: 1 lb skinless, boneless chicken breast, chopped
steps: Cook pasta according to directions on container.
Melt butter over medium-high heat and cook vegetables along with 1 tablespoon garlic powder for about 10 minutes.
Over medium-high heat, cook the sausage and chicken while seasoning with salt, paprika, black pepper, onion powder, cayenne pepper, basil, and 2 teaspoons garlic powder.
Cook the chicken until it is no longer pink and the juices run clear, about 10 minutes.
Remove meat with a slotted spoon and mix in with vegetables along with half of the alfredo sauce.
In a lightly greased baking dish, layer the bottom with 4 lasagna noodles.
Spread half of the meat and vegetable mixture over the noodles.
Repeat the layers and cover with a layer of noodles.
Spread mozzarella cheese over the top and add another layer of noodles.
Pour remaining alfredo sauce over the top. Fill the empty jar of alfredo sauce halfway with water and also pour over the top.
Sprinkle parmesan cheese over the top.
Bake at 325 degrees for about 50 minutes. Let sit about 15 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Cashew Broccoli
steps: Place broccoli in a large pot with about 1 inch of water in the bottom.
Bring to a boil and cook for about 7 minutes.
Drain broccoli and remove from heat.
Melt the butter in the microwave or on the stove.
Mix the sugar, soy sauce, pepper, and garlic powder into the butter.
Remove the butter from heat and mix in the cashews.
Mix the butter and cashews with the broccoli.

recipes.name: Cheddar Baked Chicken
steps: In a bowl, mix flour and seasonings.
In another bowl, beat together egg and milk.
In a third bowl, mix cheese and bread crumbs.
Dunk the chicken pieces in the flour mixture, then the egg mixture, then the cheese mixture.
Place the coated chicken pieces in a lightly greased baking dish.
Pour melted butter over the chicken pieces.
Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes.

recipes.name: Cheeseburger Meatloaf
steps: In a large bowl, combine beef, bread crumbs, onion, eggs, seasonings, and mix together well.
Place mixture into a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish.
Shape the beef into two layers, with cheese between and on top.
Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour.

recipes.name: Cheesy Chicken Potatoes
ingredients: 1 (10.75 oz) can condensed cream of chicken soup
steps: Place peppers in slow cooker, top with potatoes, then chicken.
Sprinkle paprika and pour soup over chicken. Also pour one can of water over the chicken.
Cook on low for 6 to 8 hours.
About 1 hour before serving, take chicken out, shred, and return to slow cooker.
About 15 mins before serving, add velveeta cheese.
Stir every few minutes until cheese is evenly mixed in.

recipes.name: Chicken Fajita Casserole
steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package.
Heat oil over medium heat, add onions and peppers.
Cook until vegetables are soft, about 5-7 minutes.
Add chicken and cook until no longer pink, about 10 minutes.
Combine salsa, cream cheese, and seasonings in a saucepan over low heat.
Cook until cream cheese is melted, about 10 minutes.
Combine pasta, chicken, salsa mixture, black beans, corn, and onion mixture in a lightly greased baking dish.
Mix half the shredded cheese into the casserole.
Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes.
Remove from oven, top with remaining cheese.
Bake for another 10 minutes.

recipes.name: Cilantro Lime Chicken Tacos
ingredients: 2 cups shredded cheese of your choice
steps: Place chicken in slow cooker and pour salsa, lime juice, and cilantro over the top.
Stir together and cook on low for 6 hours.
About one hour before serving, shred the chicken and put back into slow cooker along with the green pepper and onion.
Let cook for one more hour on low.
When done cooking, place chicken mixture in tortillas and top with cheese.

recipes.name: Cilantro Lime Rice
steps: Cook rice according to directions on box.
Mix rest of ingredients into cooked rice.

recipes.name: Egg Scrambler
steps: Boil potato in salted water for about 20 minutes, or until tender.
Saute onions and green peppers in lightly oiled large pot over medium-high heat, about 5-10 minutes.
Reduce heat to medium and pour in eggs.
Cook until the bottom has set, about 2 minutes.
Stir in chopped potatoes and tomatoes, salt, pepper, and cayenne pepper. (Optional: cook some sausage or bacon separately, chop up, and add to this step)
Cook until all the eggs have set, maybe about 10 minutes or so.
Just before serving, sprinkle cheese over the top.

recipes.name: Fried Egg
steps: Preheat frying pan over medium heat.
Crack the egg in a separate bowl.
Pour egg into frying pan and cook for 2-3 minutes on one side.
While the egg is cooking add salt, pepper, or other seasonings as desired.
Flip and cook for an additional 2 minutes.

recipes.name: French Toast Casserole
ingredients: 1 (21 oz) can of apple pie filling
steps: Lightly butter the bottom of the pan.
Tear the 12 slices of bread and evenly spread them in the pan.
In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, 2 tablespoons sugar, salt, and vanilla.
Pour the egg mixture over the bread.
Dot the bread with butter and let stand for about 10 minutes.
Sprinkle 2 tablespoons sugar and cinnamon over the top.
Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes.
When done, let stand for 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Fried Potatoes
steps: Heat oil over medium-high heat.
Cook potatoes in oil until golden brown, about 5 minutes.
Stir in optional green pepper and cook for about another 1-2 minutes.

recipes.name: Fried Red Potatoes
ingredients: 6 medium red potatoes, cut into chunks
steps: Heat oil over medium heat.
Cook potatoes for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Stir in seasonings and cook for about 5 more minutes.

recipes.name: Garlic Parmesan Zucchini
steps: Heat oil over medium heat.
Add zucchini slices and sprinkle garlic powder, salt, and pepper on them.
Cook the zucchini for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until soft.
After zucchini are done cooking, sprinkle Parmesan cheese on them.

recipes.name: Green Bean Casserole
ingredients: 1 (10 oz) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1/3 cup cheddar or pepper jack cheese
1/2 cup La Choy Chow Mein noodles
steps: Heat oil over medium-high heat.
Add onion and cook for about 3 minutes.
Add green beans and cook for about 2 minutes.
Stir in soup and milk, cook for about 2 minutes.
Add cheese, cook for about 2 minutes.
Remove from heat and add Chow Mein noodles just before serving.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese
steps: Preheat frying pan over medium heat.
Butter one side of bread and place butter-side-down onto skillet.
Add 1 slice of cheese on top of the bread.
Butter one side of second slice of bread and place butter-side-up on top of the sandwich.
Grill until lightly browned and flip.
Continue grilling until cheese is melted and other side is lightly browned.

recipes.name: Hamburger Potato Casserole
ingredients: 1 (10.75 oz) can condensed cream of chicken soup
steps: Over medium heat, brown the beef along with the onions and green peppers.
Put the cooked beef mixture in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish.
Add potatoes, cream of chicken soup, milk, and seasonings into the baking dish and stir together.
Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour and 10 minutes.
Top the casserole with cheddar cheese and cook for another 20 minutes.
Let sit for about 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Hash Brown Casserole
ingredients: 1 (2 lb) package frozen hash brown potatoes, thawed
1 (10.75 oz) can condensed cream of chicken soup
steps: In a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish, mix together hash browns, melted butter, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, onion, cheese, and seasonings.
Bake at 350 degrees for 40 minutes.
Let sit for about 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Kielbasa with Peppers and Potatoes
steps: Heat the oil in the saucepan over medium heat.
Place kielbasa and potatoes in the saucepan.
Cover and cook for 25 minutes, stirring occasionally until potatoes are tender.
Mix in the peppers and continue cooking 5 minutes, until peppers are tender.

recipes.name: Manicotti Italian Casserole
steps: Cook pasta according to directions on the box.
Once cooked, transfer the pasta to a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish.
Cook the beef, sausage, peppers, and onions over medium heat until the meat is browned.
After the meat and vegetables are done cooking, use a slotted spoon to transfer to the baking dish.
Stir spaghetti sauce into the meat and pasta, mixing everything together evenly.
Sprinkle half the cheese over the top, followed by the pepperoni, followed by the remaining cheese.
Bake at 350 degrees for about 20 minutes.
Let cool for about 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Mashed Potatoes with Skins
steps: Bring a pot of water to a boil and cook potatoes until tender, about 15 minutes.
Drain potatoes and transfer to a bowl.
Add butter and mash with a potato masher or electric mixer until potatoes start becoming smooth.
Add milk, seasonings, and sour cream. Mix to desired texture.

recipes.name: Meatball Sub Casserole
steps: Tear bagels into bite-sized pieces and layer on the bottom of a lightly-greased 9x13 baking dish.
Layer the cottage cheese, onion, and seasonings evenly over the bagel pieces.
Sprinkle half the mozzarella cheese over the casserole.
Mix the spaghetti sauce and meatballs together and layer on casserole.
Sprinkle remaining mozzarella cheese on top.
Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes.
Let sit for 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Pasta Pomodoro
steps: Cook pasta according to directions on package.
Cook meatballs according to directions on package.
Pour olive oil in a deep skillet and saute onions and garlic powder over high heat for about 5 minutes.
Reduce heat to medium-high and add tomatoes, basil, and chicken broth. Simmer for about 8 minutes.
Mix pasta, meatballs, and sauce together in a separate container.

recipes.name: Pepperoncini Beef
ingredients: 1 (3 lb) beef chuck or rump roast
steps: Make small cuts in roast and place in slow cooker.
Sprinkle garlic powder over roast.
Pour entire jar of pepperoncini, including liquid, over the meat.
Cover and cook on low for 5 hours.
Take roast out of slow cooker, shred into small pieces, and put back into crock pot for 2 more hours.
When making the sandwiches, place meat in buns, top with cheese, and cook in microwave for a few seconds to melt the cheese.

recipes.name: Pesto Chicken Penne Casserole
steps: Cook the pasta according to the directions on the box.
If the chicken is frozen, defrost in the microwave for a few minutes before dicing.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat.
Add the chicken and cook covered for about 4 minutes.
Flip the pieces of chicken, reduce heat to low, and cook covered for another 15 minutes.
Let chicken sit for a few minutes before moving the pieces to the lightly greased baking dish.
Mix the Italian cheese, spinach, tomatoes, alfredo sauce, pesto sauce, and milk in the baking dish.
Stir the pasta into the baking dish.
Mix the bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, and 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in a separate bowl and sprinkle over the top of the baking dish.
Cook in oven at 350 degrees for 40 minutes.
Let sit for about 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Pesto Tomatoes
steps: Slice tomatoes in half along the stems and remove stems.
Place tomatoes, flat side up, in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish.
Evenly distribute pesto on each tomato.
Sprinkle cheese on top of each tomato.
Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes, until cheese is melted and slightly browned.

recipes.name: Pizza Casserole
steps: Cook noodles according to directions on package.
Put the noodles in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish.
In a skillet over medium-high heat, brown the beef with the onion, garlic powder, and green pepper.
Using a slotted spoon, scoop the beef mixture onto the noodles.
Mix the pizza sauce, pepperoni, and milk in with the beef and noodles and stir until everything is evenly mixed.
Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes, top with cheese, and bake for another 10 minutes.
Let sit for 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Pulled Pork
steps: Put the pork tenderloin in the crock pot.
Pour seasonings, soy sauce, and barbeque sauce over the pork and stir.
Cook on low for about 6-7 hours.
Remove pork from crock pot, shred with a fork and knife, place pork back in crock pot, and cook for one more hour.

recipes.name: Ranch Beef and Noodles
ingredients: 1 (1 oz) packet Ranch Salad Dressing & Seasoning Mix
1/2 lb green onions or green peppers
steps: Cook noodles and drain
In a bowl, mix sour cream, milk, and seasoning mix until smooth.
Cook the beef over medium heat until nicely browned.
Drain the grease from the beef.
Add the onions or peppers and cook until vegetables are tender.
Remove beef and vegetables from stove, mix together with noodles and sauce.

recipes.name: Red, White, and Blue Fruit Salad
steps: Heat the cream cheese in the microwave for about 40 seconds to soften it up.
Beat the cream cheese in a large bowl, slowly adding sugar and stirring until smooth.
Slowly stir in the cool whip and stir until smooth.
Add strawberries and blueberries and mix together evenly.

recipes.name: Sausage Alfredo
steps: Cook pasta according to directions on box.
Saute sausage and tomatoes over medium-high until browned, about 10 minutes.
Mix together pasta, sausage mixture, and alfredo sauce in a large container.

recipes.name: Sausage and Tortellini Skillet
ingredients: 1 (14 oz) kielbasa or smoked sausage, sliced
steps: Cook tortellini according to directions on package.
Move tortellini to a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish.
Heat skillet over medium-high heat and add sausage.
Cook for about 2-3 minutes and add green peppers and onions.
Cook until vegetables are soft and sausage is browned.
Move sausage and vegetables to baking dish and stir together.
Add marinara sauce, garlic powder, basil, and 1/2 cup of cheese to baking dish and stir together.
Top with remaining cheese.
Cook at 350 degrees for 10 minutes.
Let sit for 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Sauteed Onions
steps: Heat the oil or butter over medium-high heat.
Add the onions and cook for about 7-10 minutes.
As they cook, push the onions around the pan to evenly cook them.

recipes.name: Scalloped Potatoes
steps: Lightly grease the baking dish.
Layer 1/3 of the potato slices, followed by 1/3 of the onions, 3 tablespoons of flour, and 2 tablespoons of butter spread across the layer.
Add as much salt and pepper as desired.
Repeat these two steps two more times.
Pour the milk over the top of the potatoes.
Bake at 375 degrees for 45 minutes.

recipes.name: Scallops
steps: Pat scallops dry with paper towel and sprinkle generously with salt and pepper.
Heat butter in pan over medium-high heat.
Place scallops in pan spaced about an inch apart.
Cook scallops for 3 minutes on each side, or until golden brown on both sides.

recipes.name: Shepherd's Pie
ingredients: 1 (10 oz) can of peas and carrots, drained
steps: Bring a large pot of water to a boil and add the diced potatoes.
Drain and mash potatoes, while mixing in milk, butter, salt, and pepper.
Brown beef and saute onions over medium-high heat. After about 5 minutes, pour in Worcestershire sauce.
Prepare gravy according to instructions on packet.
In a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish, mix the beef mixture and gravy. Evenly layer the beef mixture.
Add an even layer of peas and carrots, then mashed potatoes.
Top with shredded cheese.
Bake at 375 degrees for 20 minutes.

recipes.name: Smothered Burritos
ingredients: 1 (10 oz) can diced tomatoes with green chiles
steps: Cook ground beef over medium-high heat until browned.
Add onions and peppers, cook until onions are translucent.
Drain grease and season with garlic powder, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Stir in diced tomatoes with chiles, refried beans, and chili with beans.
Reduce heat to low and continue cooking until the meat and beans are warm.
In a separate bowl, combine the enchilada sauce, tomato soup, and one can of water.
When finished cooking the beef, scoop some of the mixture into a tortilla.
Wrap the burrito, top with lettuce, then the sauce, then the cheese.
Heat in microwave for about 1 minute and add sour cream if desired.

recipes.name: Spicy Garlic Lime Chicken
steps: In a small bowl, mix together salt, black pepper, cayenne pepper, paprika, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, onion powder, thyme, and parsley.
Sprinkle mixture on both sides of chicken breasts.
Heat butter and oil in a frying pan over medium heat.
Cook chicken until golden brown, about 6-7 minutes on each side.
Sprinkle with 2 teaspoons of garlic powder and lime juice.
Cook 5 minutes, stirring frequently to evenly coat the sauce.

recipes.name: Spinach Chicken Parmesan
steps: Lay pieces of chicken in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish.
In a small saucepan, saute onion, green pepper, and butter over medium-high heat.
Once cooked, add in flour and milk, stirring until bubbly. Stir in spinach.
Sprinkle seasoning over the pieces of chicken, then spoon spinach mixture over each piece.
Top the chicken with parmesan cheese and bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes.

recipes.name: Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: 1 cup parmesan, cheddar, or pepper jack cheese
steps: Remove stems and seeds from green peppers and slice in half lengthwise.
Cook rice according to directions on package.
Brown the beef over medium heat.
In a bowl, mix the beef, rice, 1 can of tomato sauce, and garlic powder.
Put an equal amount of mixture in each pepper.
Pour remaining can of tomato sauce over the peppers.
Preheat oven to 350 degrees and bake for 1 hour.
With about 10 minutes to go, cover the peppers with cheese.

recipes.name: Sweet and Sour Sausage
ingredients: 1 cup pineapple, drained if from a can
steps: Cook rice according to directions on package.
Cook sausage, peppers, and onions over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, or until sausage is slightly browned.
Add pineapple to sausage and vegetables and cook for another 5 minutes.
Mix rice, sausage, and vegetables together in a serving container.
Mix in sweet and sour sauce.

recipes.name: Swiss Chicken Casserole
ingredients: 1 (10.75 oz) can condensed cream of chicken soup
steps: Place chicken breasts in a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish.
Place one slice of cheese on each piece of chicken.
Combine cream of chicken soup and milk in separate bowl and evenly pour over chicken.
Sprinkle with stuffing mix and pour melted butter over the top.
Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes.

recipes.name: Taco Spaghetti Bake
ingredients: 1 (10.75 oz) can condensed cream of chicken soup
steps: Cook spaghetti according to directions on box.
Cook and brown beef and vegetables over medium-high heat, adding cumin after about 5 minutes.
Add spaghetti and beef mixture to a lightly greased 9x13 baking dish.
Mix in corn, taco sauce, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, and 1 cup cheddar cheese.
Sprinkle remaining cheddar cheese over the top.
Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes.
Let sit for 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Tater Tot Casserole
ingredients: 1 (10.75 oz) can condensed cream of chicken soup
steps: Brown the beef along with the onions over medium-high heat.
Lightly grease a 9x13 baking dish and place the beef and onions in the dish with a slotted spoon.
Pour Worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, black pepper, cream of chicken soup, corn, milk, 1/2 cup cheddar cheese, and tater tots in the baking dish and stir together.
Sprinkle the rest of the cheese over the top of the casserole.
Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes.
Let sit for 5 minutes before serving.
